channel.title: TravelgateX Documentation â€“ Alerts-X
channel.description: Recent changes in Alerts-X on TravelgateX Documentation

item.title: Alerts-X: Overview
item.description: In order to analyze useful metrics about performance, Alerts-X extracts, loads and stores data from all TravelgateX products. Once the metrics are stored in our infrastructure, our service-alerts analyze your performance according to a configuration alert which can be created/updated or viewed using API alertsWorking with Alerts-X The most important use case working with Alerts is to query about your performance.

item.title: Alerts-X: Reference
item.description:
Our reference pages explain all aspects of our GraphQL schema. These pages are divided into the following sections: Schema: Explains how our Schema works and the two key operations: Queries and Mutations Objects: A complete list of all objects in our schema, their definitions, what fields they use and when they are mandatory. role=“alert”>We are currently building out examples for every Object page. Please send us a Pull request if you would like to see an example for a particular Object, or if you would like to share your own example with the TravelgateX community.
[...]
